Welcome to the 511 Bar & Lounge
The 511 Bar & Lounge
We are a local bar in the heart of the Flagler Village Arts District in Fort Lauderdale.Â  Our goal is to provide a venue for local residents to experience great art, music and entertainment in an affordable, friendly social environment.Â  Our unique cocktails, designed by Owner Trenton Oâ€™Connor, are blended from scratch by our awesome bar staff, and we offer a selection of locally brewed beers served up in frozen glasses. Stop by and say Hi.Â  Weâ€™d love to meet you.

511 Bar & Lounge
511 NE 3rd Ave
Fort Lauderdale, Fl 33301
